summary:
"A Tech Geek passionate about Social Impact!"
On a mission to make Personalized Medicine accessible, for everyone, globally.

Why I founded OASYS NOW?

   "As a refugee from Iran, I had to travel from country to country together with my parents before arriving in the Netherlands. My mother, Anna, suffers from chronic diseases that need constant treatment, medications, and care. However, in every new country we arrived in, Anna had to go through a complete re-diagnosis before receiving the recognition of her disease and the appropriate care for it. Frustrated by this experience, I set out on a mission to build a better patient journey that could help patients, healthcare providers, and researchers worldwide.

Having worked with state-of-the-art technology in my research, projects, and Computer Science study at TU Delft, I envisioned a world where: "each citizen is in ownership and control of their health data and has access to the best and the latest treatments, all-in-one platform, at their fingertips reach, personalized specifically to their each medical needs."

In 2018, together with my mission-driven co-founders, we established OASYS NOW to revolutionize patients' access to treatments by utilizing the greatest advancements in science and technology and empowering citizens with control over their health data.

At OASYS NOW, we help patients get personalized treatments by putting them in control of their data."

projects.title: Interactive Robotics Context Project
projects.description:
The vision of the project was to develop the Pepper Robots from SoftBank to serve at Information Desks and Concierges of Hotels, Universities, Events, and similar venues as a robot that helps you get information about the location, event or make reservations for rooms or halls.
The ultimate goal of the project is to program the robot to also be able to help people with disabilities such as blindness, muteness or deafness.

This was a University-based Team Project, we were a group of 5 students working together 3 to 4 days a week and an overall of above 25 hours a week for around 3 months. We programmed mostly in Python and PHP and used GitLab hosted on our University servers as our Version Control, CI/CD, SCRUM, task assignments and more.

Overall, it was a successful project. We managed to implement most of we had planned and learn a lot from working in a group and having Product Managers, supervisor, customers/Product Owers, SCRUM master, etc.

projects.title: Formula1 Racing Game (for OOP Project)
projects.description: We created a Formula1 Racing game for our Object Orientated Programming Project.

profile_positions.description:
"Making Personalized Medicine accessible, for everyone, globally."
To bring personalized healthcare to patients faster, we need to utilize data to better connect patients and relevant (clinical) research. At OASYS NOW we do both!
We empower citizens and patients to take control of their DNA & Health data, and connect them with relevant research via our privacy-by-design platform.
profile_positions.title: CEO & Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
We exist for the creators. The builders. The architects. We are building the products to make application development as quick as the speed of thought. We exist to radically change how we invent and build our digital tools.

As the Director of Product Development, I was responsible for leading our organization in research for new products, product enhancements, and product design.
profile_positions.title: Director Of Product Development

profile_positions.description:
With a track record of success, SocialSpaceship has been privileged to work with some of the biggest names in the industry, including NRC, Rabobank, MTV, Accenture, and VanHaren. Our clients trust us to deliver impactful digital experiences that drive results and create a lasting impression.

Our award-winning team is passionate about pushing boundaries and breaking the mold. We've been recognized by T500 and SAN New Kids on The Block for our innovative approach and exceptional results. We don't just follow the latest trends, we create them.

At SocialSpaceship, we believe that a great digital experience is at the heart of every successful brand. That's why we're dedicated to helping our clients tell their stories and connect with their audience in meaningful ways. If you're looking for a partner who will elevate your brand and take your digital presence to the next level, look no further. SocialSpaceship is the agency for you.

As the first team member, I was in charge of product development, marketing and sales strategy, customer success, and project management.
profile_positions.title: Product Development Lead

profile_positions.description:
For my Thesis, I joined the Weissbrodt group, at the Department of Biotechnology, in the Faculty of Applied Sciences (TNW), to research Reproducibility issues in the field of Metagenomics and DNA analysis. 
With this research, I strived to connect the world of Computer Science and Biology in the field of Bioinformatics and received an 8.5 for my thesis.
A link to my paper can be found below:
https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A56d7cb92-f012-4474-a0a6-290381a83a92?collection=education
profile_positions.title: Scientific Researcher | Bioinformatics

Inflow, IT, Excellence, Study Success, Minors, Masters,
